title: Test Feature: UI Interactions
description: This feature introduces interactive UI elements for testing and verification purposes. The goal is to verify the autonomous loop's ability to implement simple UI interactions and logical transformations. The feature consists of two main components: 1. A visual "Blink" effect for the page. 2. A text transformation tool for "Sarcasm" generation.

stories.title: Implement the "Blink" button
stories.description: Create a button that makes the entire page blink neon green every 5 seconds.
acceptance_criteria: Verify details: Create a button that makes the entire page blink neon green every 5 seconds.

stories.title: Add "Random Sarcasm" generator
stories.description: A feature that replaces all vowels in user input with 'o' randomly.
acceptance_criteria: Verify details: A feature that replaces all vowels in user input with 'o' randomly.
